Thank you for taking the time to participate in the Java OOP Quiz. Below are the Answers to the Questions asked.
Complexity of a class and not the class itself
Question 2: In the case of method overloading, there must be an IS-A relationship :
This is false because method oveloading deals with methods in the same class so there is no Inheritance involved
Question 3: OOP promotes a way of programming, that allows programmers to think in terms of?
Object Oriented programming allows programmers to think int terms of Objects
Question 4: If there is a private method in the class, which type of binding will take place? :
Private methods in a class can only be bound statically because when they are made private, the compiler will only determine them at compiled time.
Question 5: Name should be stated with a lowercase letter in the case of which of the following?:
In Java, Methods are always defined starting with a lowercase letter while Classes and Interfaces always start with uppercase letters
Hope you learnt 5 new things about Java Object Oriented Programming. Thank you !
